description: Render PlantUML diagrams inline in Markdown. Export to self-contained HTML. Secure by design.
submenu.label: PlantUML Markdown Preview
command.openPreview.title: Open Preview to Side
command.exportHtml.title: Export as HTML
command.exportHtmlAndOpen.title: Export as HTML & Open in Browser
command.changeTheme.title: Change Preview Theme
configuration.title: PlantUML Markdown Preview
configuration.jarPath.description: Path to the PlantUML jar file (e.g. /usr/local/lib/plantuml.jar)
configuration.javaPath.description: Path to the Java executable (default: java)
configuration.dotPath.description: Path to the Graphviz dot executable (default: dot)
configuration.debounceNoPlantUmlMs.descr: Debounce delay (ms) when only non-PlantUML text changes (cache hit, no Java invocation). Default: 100
configuration.debouncePlantUmlMs.descrip: Debounce delay (ms) when PlantUML content changes (Java invocation required). Default: 300
configuration.plantumlTheme.description: PlantUML diagram theme. 'default' uses PlantUML default (no theme applied). Set a theme name (e.g. 'cyborg', 'mars') to pass -theme to PlantUML CLI. Default: default
configuration.allowLocalImages.descripti: Allow loading local images in the preview. When enabled, relative image paths (e.g. ![](./image.png)) are resolved and displayed. Default: true
configuration.allowHttpImages.descriptio: Allow loading images over HTTP (unencrypted) in the preview. Useful for intranet or local development servers. Disabled by default for security. Default: false
configuration.previewTheme.description: Preview theme. Controls the overall document style and code block syntax highlight together. Default: github-light
configuration.previewTheme.github-light: GitHub Light (Default) — white background, dark text. Code blocks: github-dark-dimmed
configuration.previewTheme.atom-light: Atom Light — white background, soft gray text. Atom editor inspired.
configuration.previewTheme.one-light: One Light — off-white background, balanced palette. Atom One Light inspired.
configuration.previewTheme.solarized-lig: Solarized Light — warm beige background, eye-friendly colors.
configuration.previewTheme.vue: Vue — white background, green accents. Vue.js documentation inspired.
configuration.previewTheme.pen-paper-cof: Pen Paper Coffee — warm paper background, brown-tinted text. Cozy handwritten aesthetic.
configuration.previewTheme.coy: Coy — near-white background, clean design. Prism.js Coy inspired.
configuration.previewTheme.vs: Visual Studio Light — white background, classic VS color scheme. Blue keywords, green comments.
configuration.previewTheme.github-dark: GitHub Dark — dark background, light text. Code blocks: github-dark
configuration.previewTheme.atom-dark: Atom Dark — dark background, muted text. Tomorrow Night palette.
configuration.previewTheme.one-dark: One Dark — dark background, muted text. Atom/VS Code inspired.
configuration.previewTheme.solarized-dar: Solarized Dark — deep teal background, eye-friendly colors.
configuration.previewTheme.monokai: Monokai — dark background, vivid syntax colors. Sublime Text inspired.
